alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Knox; Loudon; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 7:33PM CDT until June 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOUDON...SOUTHWESTERN KNOX...SOUTHWESTERN ANDERSON AND NORTHEASTERN ROANE COUNTIES... At 833 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oak Ridge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Oak Ridge, Clinton, Lenoir City, Farragut, Oliver Springs, Karns and Coalfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 361 and 381. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 83 and 84. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
